summary: A documentary about the stereotype of the gay voice.
cast: Michael Airington|Richard Barrios|Margaret Cho|Becky Collins|Bob Corff|Tim Gunn|Jeff Hiller|Zach King|Don Lemon|Benjamin Munson|Susan Sankin|Dan Savage|David Sedaris|Ron Smyth|George Takei|David Thorpe|Kenji Yoshino
title: Do I Sound Gay?
